Hymn.Arabic: قَدِ ارْتَسَمَ عَلَيْنَا نُورُ وَجْهِكَ يَا رَبُّ.
Hymn.English: 6 Lord, lift up the light of Your countenance upon us
7 You have put gladness in my heart.

Hymn.Arabic: لِأَنَّكَ أَنْتَ وَحْدَكَ يَا رَبُّ ، أَسْكَنْتَنِي عَلَى الرَّجَاءِ. هَلِّلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 8 For You alone, O Lord, make me dwell in safety.
